function.name: StoreBinary
function.description: Store a binary object in Shared Store

function.name: GetBinary
function.description: Gets a binary object from Shared Store

function.name: EncryptString
function.description: Encrypts a string

function.name: DecryptString
function.description: Decrypts a string

function.name: GetRequest
function.description: Returns the current request Navajo as a string representation

function.name: GetHeader
function.description: Returns a specified attribute value from the request header

function.name: Abs
function.description: Returns absolute value of a number

function.name: Age
function.description: calculates the age given a birth date. The calculation is as of the second date parameter, otherwise, if not provided, will be as of today.

function.name: AppendArray
function.description: Appends the first array message to the second array message. Returns the second message. Note: Call by reference function

function.name: ArraySelection
function.description: Checks whether properties in an array message have unique values

function.name: Base64Encode
function.description: Get a Base64 representation of a given string or binary(deprecated).

function.name: CallService
function.description: Calls a service using request Navajo and evaluates an expression

function.name: CheckDate
function.description: Checks whether the input param is a date, returns true if this is the case

function.name: CheckEmail
function.description: This functions checks the syntactic validity of email adressess

function.name: CheckFloat
function.description: CheckFloat checks whether argument is valid double

function.name: CheckInteger
function.description: CheckInteger checks whether argument is valid integer

function.name: CheckRange
function.description: Check if a list of values is zero or lesser than a given number.

function.name: CheckUniqueness
function.description: Checks whether properties in an array message have unique values

function.name: CheckUrl
function.description: This function will check whether it returns a valid stream. It will throw an exception when the the URL is malformed, it returns false when the string is null

function.name: CreateExpression
function.description: Create a Navajo expression from a string that only contains text and property references

function.name: CurrentTimeMillis
function.description: CurrentTimeMillis(), returns the time in millis since 1/1/1970

function.name: Date
function.description: Create a date object from a given string. String is expected to be of format: yyyy-MM-dd.

function.name: DateAdd
function.description: Get a new Date object where the given field is increased by a given amount. Possible fields are YEAR, MONTH, WEEK and DAY.

function.name: DateField
function.description: Get a specific part of the given date, options are WEEK, YEAR and DAY.

function.name: DateSubstract
function.description: Substracts two date object

function.name: DayOfWeek
function.description: This function return a calendar date of the first given weekday in the past

function.name: DecimalChar
function.description: This function returns a string representation of the desired decimal character

function.name: EmptyBinary
function.description: Creates an empty binary object

function.name: EqualsPattern
function.description: Determines whether a string matches a pattern

function.name: Euro
function.description: Will return a euro sign.

function.name: EvaluateExpression
function.description: Evaluate a Navajo expression

function.name: EvaluateParameters
function.description: Fill in parameter properties, like EvaluateExpression, but lightweight and for properties of the currentMessage only

function.name: ExecuteScript
function.description: ExecuteScript is used execute a Navajo script, the result is a Binary (xml) object

function.name: Exists
function.description: Evaluates a condition (expression evaluating to a boolean) under any the messages of an array message. It will return a 'OR' of all the results

function.name: ExistsProperty
function.description: Checks whether a property exists in the Input Navajo

function.name: ExistsSelectionValue
function.description: Checks if the given value is available as one of the options in the given selection property

function.name: File
function.description: Reads a file

function.name: FileExists
function.description: Returns true if the filename exists. (Either as a file or as a directory

function.name: FileSize
function.description: Get the filesize of supplied Binary object in bytes.

function.name: FileString
function.description: Reads a file into a string

function.name: ForAll
function.description: Evaluates a condition (expression evaluating to a boolean) under all the messages of an array message. It will return a 'AND' of all the results

function.name: FormatDate
function.description: formats a date according to a format string plus an optional locale

function.name: FormatDecimal
function.description: Formats a number

function.name: FormatStringList
function.description: Turns a list of strings in a single string using supplied delimiter.

function.name: FormatZipCode
function.description: formats a date according to a format string plus an optional locale

function.name: GetBinaryPath
function.description: Returns the path to a binary

function.name: GetCents
function.description: GetCents takes an amount of money and returns the cents

function.name: GetContextResource
function.description: GetContextResource gets the contents of a file in the servletcontext/resources folder

function.name: GetCurrentMessage
function.description: This function will return the current message

function.name: GetDescription
function.description: Gets the description of property as a string

function.name: GetFileExtension
function.description: Guesses mime/type of a binary object and returns default file extension

function.name: GetInitials
function.description: This function returns the initials of a specified string field . Eg. GetInitials('aap noot mies') results in 'a n m'

function.name: GetLogoImage
function.description: Get the specified string a a nice mirroed logo image

function.name: GetMessage
function.description: Gets a message from an array message. Or: GetMessage('MessagePath') will retrieve the message from the current navajo (Used for scripts)

function.name: GetMimeType
function.description: Guesses mime/type of a binary object

function.name: GetProperty
function.description: Gets a property from a string

function.name: GetPropertyAttribute
function.description: Gets the type of property as a string

function.name: GetPropertyDirection
function.description: Gets the direction of property as a string

function.name: GetPropertySubType
function.description: Gets the subtype of property as a string

function.name: GetPropertyType
function.description: Gets the type of property as a string

function.name: GetPropertyValue
function.description: Gets a property from a string

function.name: GetReportFile
function.description: Reads a report file from the script folder to a binary

function.name: GetSelectedName
function.description: Gets the name of a selected property

function.name: GetSelectedValue
function.description: Gets the value of a selected property

function.name: GetUrlMimeType
function.description: Check the mime type of an url.

function.name: GetUrlModificationTime
function.description: Check the modification date of an url.

function.name: GetUrlSize
function.description: Get the length of URL content

function.name: GetUrlTime
function.description: Check the date of an url. This is not the modification date, this is the time the header was sent. Effectively the current time of the webserver.

function.name: GetValue
function.description: Gets a typed value from a property object

function.name: GetVersionInfo
function.description: Gets the version info of a specific Version object

function.name: GetWeekDayDate
function.description: This function return the a calendar date of the first given weekday in the past. Optionally a third parameter can be added containing a date. This is the reference date used

function.name: IfElse
function.description: IfElse(boolean,any,any)

function.name: InMonthTurnInterval
function.description: Returns true when a given date is either in the first or last n days of the month

function.name: IsArrayMessage
function.description: IsArrayMessage( Message )

function.name: IsDate
function.description: IsDate(date|string)

function.name: IsEmpty
function.description: Determines whether a given object is null or empty

function.name: IsFutureDate
function.description: IsFutureDate(date|string)

function.name: IsNull
function.description: Will return true if the supplied argument is null, false otherwise

function.name: IsNumeric
function.description: IsNumeric(string|integer|float)

function.name: IsServiceCached
function.description: Function to check whether a service with optionally service key values is cached

function.name: KeyValueMap
function.description: KeyValueMap(string,string,string)

function.name: Max
function.description: Return the maximum of two given numbers.

function.name: MD5Sum
function.description: Get the MD5Sum of a supplied object.

function.name: MergeNavajo
function.description: Merges two navajo objects

function.name: Min
function.description: Return the minimum of two given numbers.

function.name: NavajoRequestToString
function.description: Serializes a Navajo request to a string

function.name: NextMonth
function.description: Get the next month as a date object, where supplied integer is an offset for the current year.

function.name: Now
function.description: Now() returns the current timestamp as a string in the following format: yyyy/MM/dd HH:uu:mm

function.name: OffsetDate
function.description: Returns a date with a certain offset.

function.name: ParameterList
function.description: Create a list of comma separate ? values for use in SQL queries

function.name: ParseDate
function.description: Tries to transform the (string) object to a date by guessing its format or use the given format

function.name: ParseSelection
function.description: This function creates a selection out of a semi-colon separated string of options

function.name: ParseStringList
function.description: Creates a list out of a string representation, e.g. {1,2,3,8,9}

function.name: Random
function.description: Returns random integer

function.name: RandomColor
function.description: Generates a random hex color given an integer seed

function.name: RandomInt
function.description: Returns a random integer, between the given bounds

function.name: RandomString
function.description: allows generation of random string values given a specified length using a specific character set, sometimes useful for testing fixtures ...if a character set is not provided, a default one is used

function.name: Round
function.description: With this function a floating point value can be rounded to a given number of digits. Round(2.372, 2) = 2.37

function.name: ScaleImageCentered
function.description: Scales an image to the specified dimensions (with transparency if needed). Keeps aspect ratio, and uses the largest value of the dimensions

function.name: ScaleImageCropped
function.description: Scales an image to the specified dimensions (with transparency if needed). Keeps aspect ratio, and crops the image to the new size if necessary

function.name: ScaleImageFree
function.description: Scales an image to the specified dimensions. Does not keep aspect ratio.

function.name: ScaleImageMax
function.description: Scales an image to the specified dimensions. Keeps aspect ratio, and uses the largest value of the dimensions

function.name: ScaleImageMin
function.description: Scales an image to the specified dimensions. Keeps aspect ratio, and uses the smallest value of the dimensions

function.name: SetAllProperties
function.description: Loops through an array message, and sets for every message the property with the supplied name to the supplied value

function.name: SetMimeType
function.description: Sets mime-type for a binary object

function.name: Size
function.description: This function return the size of a list argument, the length of an array, or the size of an array message.

function.name: StringDistance
function.description: Returns an Integer representing how much the two strings differ, 0 is equal

function.name: StringField
function.description: This function returns a specified string field given a seperator and an initial string. Eg. StringField('aap, noot, mies', ',', 2) = 'noot'.

function.name: StringFunction
function.description: Perform a Java stringfunction on a given string.

function.name: StringPadding
function.description: This function ads whitespace (spaces) to a string until it has the specified size

function.name: StripTime
function.description: StripTime(date|string,[string])

function.name: Sum
function.description: Get the sum of values in a given list.

function.name: SumExpressions
function.description: Sum expressions in a given array message

function.name: SumProperties
function.description: Sums all properties in an array message

function.name: Switch
function.description: Switch(target, when, then, when, then, when, then, ..., else)

function.name: Sysdate
function.description: Sysdate() returns the current date, with time

function.name: ToBinary
function.description: Cast a string to a binary object

function.name: ToBinaryFromPath
function.description: Load a binary from a URL

function.name: ToBinaryFromUrl
function.description: Load a binary from a URL

function.name: ToClockTime
function.description: Cast an object to a clocktime object

function.name: Today
function.description: Today() returns the current date, with time at 00:00

function.name: ToDouble
function.description: Get a Double version of supplied object. Returns 0.0 if object is null.

function.name: ToInteger
function.description: Get an integer representation of given object.

function.name: ToLong
function.description: Get an long representation of given object.

function.name: ToLower
function.description: Returns a lowercase version of the supplied string.

function.name: ToMemo
function.description: Cast a string to a memo object

function.name: ToMilliseconds
function.description: Get the supplied time in milliseconds (long).

function.name: ToMoney
function.description: Cast a string/double/integer to a money object

function.name: ToMoneyInternal
function.description: Cast a money to period separated double (as a string)

function.name: ToPercentage
function.description: Cast a string/double/integer to a percentage object

function.name: ToSecureImage
function.description: Creates a Binary containing a PNG image representation of specified objects string representation max. inputlength is 6 chars

function.name: ToStopwatchTime
function.description: Get a stopwatchtime representation of the supplied integer(in milliseconds) or date.

function.name: ToString
function.description: Returns a string representation of the supplied object.

function.name: ToUpper
function.description: Get an uppercase representation of given string.

function.name: Trim
function.description: Trims a string

function.name: Trunc
function.description: Removes time from Date object

function.name: Unicode
function.description: Parses a number string (can be hex, use 0x... in that case), returns a unicode character

function.name: URLEncode
function.description: Returns URL encoded string

function.name: Wait
function.description: Wait for specified number of milliseconds

function.name: WeekDay
function.description: Return a three letter string with the weekday; If no argument is provided return the weekday for today; Only english locale is supported now; The result is return in upper case

function.name: XmlEscape
function.description: Escapes the following characters in the characters: &'<>"

function.name: XmlUnescape
function.description: Unescapes the following characters in the characters: &'<>", using xml escape codes

function.name: Zip
function.description: Zips a binary property. Both binary property as well as filename should be supplied.

function.name: ZipArchive
function.description: Archives an entire directory (including subdirs) as a zip file.
